abstract: Bank of America says new claims that it sold bad mortgages to Fannie and Freddie are on the rise, and that some of those claims come from loans sold after the financial crisis was well underway.
snippet: Bank of America says new claims that it sold bad mortgages to Fannie and Freddie are on the rise, and that some of those claims come from loans sold after the financial crisis was well underway.

headline.main: Did Bad Loans Continue at Bank of America After 2008?
